pli-tv-pvr10:15.3: (): Tatthevāti vassaṃvutthāya cārikaṃapakkamitvā tattheva nivāsanaṃ paṭicca paññattasikkhāpadaṃ, “Tattheva: the training rule laid down because of not going wandering after completing the rainy-season residence, but staying right there.” This refers to bhikkhunī-pācittiya 40.
pli-tv-pvr10:18.1: (): Dasa gārayhāti vosāsaappaṭisaṃ viditasikkhāpadadvayañca ṭhapetvā sesāni dasa pāṭidesanīyāni, “Dasa gārayhā: apart from the two training rules on giving directions and without first making an announcement, the remaining ten rules entailing acknowledgment.”
pli-tv-pvr10:28.2: Reading vipattiyo with the PTS edition in place of vibhattiyo.
pli-tv-pvr10:66.5: (): Catutthagāthāya accayo tena samo natthīti desanāgāminīsu accayesu tena samo thūlo accayo natthi, “In the fourth verse, ‘accayo tena samo natthi’ means that in regard to the offenses that are to be confessed, there is no serious offense that is equivalent to that.” I understand the meaning to be that the existing offense classes to not capture the actions mentioned here. Thus a new class of offenses is required.
